select rownum, q.* from (select rownum as rnum, k.* from (select * from guestbook where 1=1
and guestbook_name like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
and guestbook_memo like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
and guestbook_today like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
order by guestbook_idx desc) k where rownum <= #{end} ) q where rnum >= #{start}

select count(*) as count from guestbook where 1=1
and guestbook_name like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
and guestbook_memo like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
and guestbook_today like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
order by guestbook_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook (guestbook_idx, guestbook_name, guestbook_memo) values ((select nvl(max(guestbook_idx), 0) + 1 from guestbook), #{guestbook_name}, #{guestbook_memo})
mapper.update: update guestbook set guestbook_memo = #{guestbook_memo} where guestbook_idx = #{guestbook_idx}
